metadata.title: CVE-2022-24565 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Checkmk <=2.0.0p19 Fixed in 2.0.0p20 and Checkmk <=1.6.0p27 Fixed in1.6.0p28 are affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. TheAlias of a site was not properly escaped when shown as condition fornotifications.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
